item.title: Why Choose Sides? The Power of R and Python
item.description: There seems to be a constant battle of “R” people and “Python” people. Which is better? What is more practical? Which is cooler? To be honest, they’re both great, but in their own ways. And at the end of the day, just knowing one will severely close you off from the pros of both. R has many pre-installed packages that let users do an endless amount of actions. From data visualization, generating statstics, and much more, using R’s packages makes things a lot more simplified.
